net.wequick.small

Class Small

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.wequick.small.Small

  • public final class Small
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on bundle.

    Core APIs

    • openUri(java.lang.String, android.content.Context) launch the bundle with specify activity by the uri
    • createObject(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, android.content.Context) create object from the bundle
    • setWebViewClient(WebViewClient) customize the web view behaviors for web bundle
    • registerJsHandler(String, JsHandler) customize the javascript api for web bundle
